source.guidance:
`>`: Redirects the results of a command to a defined file
`>>`: Appends information to a defined file without erasing the file's contents.
`<`: Redirects the results of a command to be used as input to a preceeding command
`<<`: Allows continuous redirection until a termination string is entered.

The following solution to this problem. can be entered into the terminal.

```
echo "Disk Space Usage Report" > diskspace.txt
df >> diskspace.txt
cat < diskspace.txt
cat << EndOfReport
I have reported the usage of disk space in KBs.
If you'd like, I can also run the report in megabytes
It would be as easy as using the df -m command
EndOfReport
```
source.instructions: When you've completed the tasks, click the button below to submit.
